newConversation(String, String, NexmoRequestListener<NexmoConversation>) - Method in class com.nexmo.client.NexmoClient
Create a new Conversation for a given display name.
NexmoApiError - Class in com.nexmo.client.request_listener
Nexmo API exception that can be caught and handled, encapsulates following information: rid: Optional request id for which the error occurred, null if the request was pre-validated client side. type: The error type as received from backend, for ex: `text:error-not-joined` cid: Optional conversation id associated with the request. message: human readable description of the exception.
NexmoApiError(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class com.nexmo.client.request_listener.NexmoApiError
